actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 214 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a taxpayer to deduct certain household and dependent care expenses if the spouse of such taxpayer is a full-time student.

summary.text: Permits a taxpayer to deduct certain household and dependent care expenses under the Internal Revenue Code if the spouse of such taxpayer is a full-time student.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 214 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a taxpayer to deduct certain household and dependent care expenses if the spouse of such taxpayer is a full-time student.
